2010.note: World's largest foundry specializing in advanced semiconductor manufacturing

2015.note: Competed with Intel for Apple chip fabrication contracts (2011-2015)

2020.note: Top competitor in chipmaking; revenue increased 25.2% to $47.78B; controlled 54% of global foundry revenue in 2020

2024.note: World's largest semiconductor foundry with >50% market share; leads in advanced process technology

2025.note: While primarily a foundry partner, TSMC's manufacturing capabilities enable competitors and its technology choices impact competitive dynamics.
